When a booking is confirmed, additional information is shared to assist with coordinating the trip, like profile photo and phone number.

When a booking request is made or dispute is submitted, certain information may be shared between Guest(s) and Host(s), including profile, name, names of any additional Guests, cancellation history, review information, age of guest (unless prohibited by applicable law), dispute outcome (when applicable) and other information you choose to share and submit
When a customer confirms a booking with you, we will provide your contact information to them to facilitate communication outside our platform as desired or necessary

When a Driver requests to book a vehicle, the Driver’s information is passed through to the Owner of the vehicle. We may also disclose parts of the public profile of the Driver and Owner; other User reviews of the Driver and Owner; and any additional information shared with other Users
When a Member requests a Ride, we may share your first name and last initial and location with a Driver Partner in order to provide the Service

When Couriers are offered delivery opportunities, they may be able to see the Customer’s delivery location. Couriers may see the Customer’s first name and last initial, and the Customer’s delivery address and/or real-time location

When you as a Host have a confirmed booking, certain information is shared with the Guest (and the additional Guests they invite, if applicable) to coordinate the booking, such as your profile, full name, phone number, and Listing address.

When you buy alcohol using the Services, we may be required by law to share certain information with the retailer who makes the sale. This information could include, among other things, the names and addresses of the purchaser and recipient, government issued ID information, the quantity, brand, price, proof, and volume of alcohol purchased, and a recipient signature

When you engage in a transaction with us, we create records of goods or services purchased or considered, as well as purchasing or consuming histories or tendencies in order to measure the effectiveness of our Services

When you send us a query in relation to a booking, or if you have a complaint in relation to a property or tour/experience, we will process your personal data in order to answer your query or in order to help resolve your complaint
